Трое друзей, родившихся в Китае в период политики «одна семья – один ребенок», сталкиваются со сложностями материалистического общества. Ироничная драма о современном китайском обществе.

<iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/_LcuZgB7ug8" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

 
**Переводчик (The Translator)**
2020, Франция/Швейцария/Сирия/Бельгия/Катар, режиссеры: Рана Казказ, Анас Халаф | Мировая премьера

Живущий в Австралии переводчик, политический беженец из Сирии, возвращается на родину в разгар революции, и его брата арестовывают. Остросюжетная драма, события которой разворачиваются в одном из самых сложных регионов в мире.

<iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Xvhf_zvYWAY" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

 
**Карнавал (Karnawal)**

2020, Боливия/Бразилия/Мексика/Аргентина/Чили/Норвегия, режиссер: Хуан Пабло Феликс | Мировая премьера

Молодой танцор готовится к самым важным соревнованиям в его жизни, когда из тюрьмы на несколько дней выпускают его отца, который вовлекает сына в мир криминала. Социальная драма, которая внезапно превращается в боевик.
 

**Фортуна (Fortuna)**
2020, Италия, режиссер: Николанджело Джелормини | Международная премьера

Николанджело Джелормини создает уникальный, сногсшибательный и захватывающий визуальный мир. Шестилетний ребенок с чудесными волосами может быть обычным маленьким итальянским ребенком Нэнси, может быть и инопланетной принцессой Фортуной. Стильная и глубокая драма, в которой ничто не является тем, чем кажется.

<iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/W344u018AT8" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

 
**Предпоследний (Den Næstsidste)**
2020, Дания, режиссер: Йонас Кёруп Хьорт | Мировая премьера

Ничего не подозревающий главный герой заходит в огромное помещение, чтобы проверить счетчик воды, и больше не находит выхода. Аллегория, полная гротескного и абсурдного черного юмора.

<iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/tJOVnqcS8Gw" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

 
**Безумная жизнь (Une Vie Démente)**
2020, Бельгия, режиссеры: Анн Сиро, Рафаэль Бальдони | Международная премьера

Алекс и Ноэми готовятся к рождению первенца, когда пожилая мать Алекса начинает проявлять признаки слабоумия. Она впадает в детство и переворачивает жизнь в доме и за его пределами с ног на голову. Трагикомедия.

<iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/cFDzwtzJEDs" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>
 

**Наводнение (The Flood)**
2020, Австралия, режиссер: Виктория Макинтайр | Международная премьера

Фильм не для слабонервных. Когда Ярах теряет свою вторую половинку, ребенка, земельный участок и затем невиновность, то решает отомстить ужасным образом. Удивительный и кровавый вестерн, который обогащают поэзия, история и культурное наследие аборигенов.

<iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/K1UxsCrdoJg" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

 
**Черный свет (빛과 철)**
2020, Южная Корея, режиссер: Пэ Джон-дэ | Международная премьера

Ведомая чувством вины жена начинает выяснять причины аварии, в которой погиб ее муж, и попадает в полный тайн лабиринт. Психологическая драма.

<iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/CdoksE-ZZlQ" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

 
**Враги (Doshmanan)**
2020, Иран, режиссер: Али Дерахшанде | Международная премьера

В небольшом городе начинают распространятся анонимные письма, которые обвиняют Зореха, мужчину средних лет, в многочисленных грехах. Вскоре выясняется, что письма отправляет он сам. Фильм с неожиданным сюжетом об одиночестве.

<iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/SEPvmhX20Ck" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>
 

**Когда ветер стихнет (Si le vent tombe)**
*2020, Бельгия/Армения/Франция, режиссер: Нора Мартиросян | Европейская премьера*

Французско-армянский полнометражный фильм Норы Мартиросян показывает неожиданные сложности, связанные с открытием международного аэропорта в объявившем свою независимость Нагорном Карабахе. Французский эксперт, который должен проверить готовность аэропорта, рискует всем, чтобы помочь этому закрытому региону открыться миру.

<iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/k1H_9p6hWkY" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>
 

**«Прощай, Советский Союз» (Hüvasti, NSVL)**
2020, Финляндия/Эстония, режиссер: Лаури Рандла | Международная премьера

Мама-одиночка Йоханнеса – студентка. В то время, как она общается с хиппи и участвует в протестах против войны в Афганистане, его воспитывают бабушка с дедушкой. Обладатели сложных характеров, они постоянно ругаются, пока мама не отправляется на работу в Финляндию и Йоханнесу не приходится самостоятельно разбираться со всеми особенностями жизни. Он по уши влюбляется в одноклассницу Веру, дерется, получает наказание… а на фоне рушится империя, которая казалось вечной. Красочная жизнь ингерманландской семьи в последние годы советской Эстонии.

<iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/bq66QwxV0e4" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>
 

**«25 лет невиновности» (25 lat niewinnosci)**
2020, Польша, режиссер: Ян Холоубек | Международная премьера

Этот фильм подробно разбирает несчастливую историю одного человека: Томаш Коменда был осужден на 25 лет за изнасилование, которого он не совершал. Несмотря на несправедливость ситуации, он на протяжении долгих лет сохраняет надежду и человечность. Фильм основан на реальных событиях, потрясших всю Польшу.

<iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/8ugos2Kef7o" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>


ФИЛЬМЫ ВНЕ КОНКУРСА

 
**Почему не ты (Hochwald)**
2020, Австрия, режиссер: Эви Ромен | Совместная премьера с Международным фестивалем в Цюрихе

После того, как во время массовой стрельбы на празднике геев убивают первую любовь Марио Ленца, он возвращается в родную консервативную деревню в Тироли, где он становится мишенью для всеобщих взглядов.

<iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Ix0ub3N0M7c" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>
 

**Сердце бьется тук-тук (Explota explota)**
2020, Испания/Италия, режиссер: Начо Альварез | Международная премьера

В Испании 1970-х, где на последнем издыхании находится диктатура Франко, молодая танцовщица стремится осуществить свою мечту стать телезвездой. Мюзикл полон ярких красок, жизнерадостности и незабываемых песен Рафаэллы Карры.
 
<iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/I3hgQ0sGu14" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>


**Родственники (Kindred)**
2020, Великобритания, режиссер: Джое Маркантонио | Европейская премьера

Ждущая ребенка женщина остается под присмотром семьи ее погибшего мужа. Чем дальше, тем больше их участие напоминает тюремный режим, и начинает казаться, что у них есть свои планы на ребенка. Психологический триллер.

<iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/4Lhl-CEZCCE" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

title_en: Safety for Foreign Guests
contents_en:
**The Black Nights Film Festival (PÖFF) corona virus requirements for foreign guests:**
 
1. All the guests arriving from abroad must do a corona virus PCR test up to 72 hours before their departure from their country of location or residence and hold a certificate in English to prove a negative result. The certificate has to be forwarded to the Guest Department of PÖFF before the flight.

2. Foreign guests who have arrived from a third country shall complete the Police and Border Guard Board’s special application form and forward that to the Guest Department of PÖFF. Information concerning travelling to Estonia is available on the [homepage of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs](https://vm.ee/en/information-countries-and-self-isolation-requirements-passengers). Visa information is available at [here](https://vm.ee/en/taxonomy/term/41).
The requirements may change in accordance with the national restrictions established in Estonia – the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, the Health Board.

3. Before arriving in the Republic of Estonia, foreign guests of the festival will complete the ‘Data for Coronavirus Test’ form which the Guest Department has previously sent to them. The data included in the form are necessary for corona virus testing at Medicum.

4. PÖFF will organise the reception, transfer and nasopharyngeal corona virus testing at Medicum.

5. All the foreign guests must carry a personal identification document for corona testing.

6. PÖFF will organise the transfer from Medicum to the hotel where the guest will wait in self-isolation until SYNLAB’s laboratory phones with the result (max 24 h). 

7. In the case of a negative result, guests can move about indoors wearing a mask (masks are provided by the festival) and adhering to all the safety requirements (disinfecting hands, keeping the 2 + 2 distance, staying only in the festival territory). If the stay is longer, a repeat test has to be taken on the 7th day.

8. For the delegation or foreign guest of every film, the festival has appointed a volunteer contact person who checks that the guest complies with safety requirements.

9. Foreign guests are instructed not to leave the festival territory and meetings are to be held in the hotel lobby where all the safety precautions must be taken when communicating with third persons (disinfecting hands, wearing a mask, keeping the 2 + 2 distance), and, if necessary, the contact details of the third persons will be forwarded to the Guest Department.
 
 **Safety during PÖFF**
Random body temperature checks will be performed in the festival territory.
All the accredited guests of the festival must comply with the orders of the organisers:
1. All the restrictions are in accordance with the nationally established restrictions and recommendations in Estonia. Upon changes therein, the organiser will, if necessary, also make changes in the festival restrictions.
2. Regular hand disinfecting.
3. Recommendations and information on wearing the mask correctly and the distribution of masks.
4. Keeping social distance (2+2). 
5. Recommendation to all the festival participants and guests to use the HOIA.me application.

**Instructions on how to act in the case of a positive corona virus test:**
1. If the test result is positive, the guest will stay in self-isolation in his/her hotel room under the observation of a physician from the family physician centre Sinu Arst, until the physician grants him/her the permission to return home. The guest will be hospitalised, if necessary.
2. All the healthcare service costs, additional nights at the hotel and other expenses related to illness and corona virus will be covered by the guest (i.e. his/her health insurance).
3. Upon concluding a travel insurance contract, foreign guests of the festival have to include payment for all the healthcare services so that it also covers the possible quarantine costs (the average of a 14-day additional stay in Estonia), the medical evacuation of a corona virus patient to the home country, if necessary, and – in the worst case – the high costs of hospital treatment.

**Return of foreign guests to their home country:**
Guests have to review the corona virus related requirements and obligations entailed in returning from the Republic of Estonia on the homepage of the foreign ministry of their home country.

title_en: Black Nights on repeat: day #5 is here.
lead_ru: Зрителей ждут 4 русскоязычных фильма: одна мировая премьера с участием создателей картины, два участника Венецианского фестиваля и фильм из фокусной программы немецкого кино!
lead_en: Satisfaction lies in mindful repetition, the discovery of endless richness in subtle variations on familiar themes. Find out what day #5 at Black Nights has in store!
contents_en:
Repetition is often used to reach a meditative state; in chants, by counting beads. In a poem by Russian poet Varlam Shalamov, a character keeps repeating a word so as not to fall asleep - and die - in the harsh climate of a Stalinist prison camp. Repetition is also the mother of learning, state proverbs from every corner of the world. 

A knowing, which marketeers gladly use in their favour. The more we see - let’s say - a Nike logo worn by others, the more the brand will become part of our world. But did you know, that Nike was a dying business in the 80’s? Until a collaboration with a sports hero brought the brand the fame they needed: and became a great example of America’s love affair with consumer capitalism and celebrity culture. 

One man who hopes not to repeat his actions on the other hand is the Kazakh Kermek, who was just released from prison. He is convinced to not be burned by the same flame twice, and sets out with a different plan.


See these films and a few more of our selections for today below.
Or check out today’s full schedule [here](https://poff.ee/en/search_screening/?dates=11/17/2020).


![F_1_sententia.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_1_sententia_b74601f1e3.jpg)
### [Sententia (World Premiere)](https://poff.ee/en/film/sententia/)
**19:00 | Coca-Cola Plaza 7 + Q&A with Dmitriy Rudakov, Polina Demina**
**22:00 | Virtual Hall**

“Sententia” is a title from “Kolyma Tales” by Russian poet Varlam Shalamov who spent seventeen years in Stalinist prison camps. The character in the story knows that he must not fall asleep in the harsh climate in the forest-felling grounds and he therefore keeps repeating an unfamiliar word that has somehow come to his mind: “Sententia!”.

The film portrays the last days of the life of the writer in a desolate home for the elderly. A visiting literary scholar and his assistant try to catch every word and letter in order to record the last verses created by the genius before the very end. 

Sententia, competing in our [First Feature Competition](https://poff.ee/en/official-selection/), explores the relationship between writer and the authorities in the Soviet society and captures the oppression of the era by using 16 mm black-and-white film.

![F_1_one_man_and_his_shoes.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_1_one_man_and_his_shoes_20c45d969d.jpg)
### [One Man and his Shoes](https://poff.ee/en/film/one-man-and-his-shoes/)
**19:00 Apollo Solaris 3**
**22:00 Virtual Hall** 

In the 1980s, Nike was a struggling business. The company’s decision-makers invited rising basketball star Michael Jordan to work with them. As Jordan became the greatest player of all time, successive models of his shoes became a market sensation. 

This documentary shows the social, cultural, and racial significance of these shoes as a symbol, and how ground-breaking marketing strategies created a billion-dollar business. A fascinating parable of America’s love affair with consumer capitalism and celebrity culture.


![F_4_gracious_night.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_4_gracious_night_73bccadd5b.jpg)
### [Gracious Night (World Premiere)](https://poff.ee/en/film/gracious-night/)
**19:15 Coca-Cola iSense + Q&A with Mika Kaurismäki, Kari Heiskanen, Pertti Sveholm**

On a deserted Walpurgis Night that is devoid of people due to the coronavirus, physician Risto manages to score some wine at a bar of his friend Heikki, in order to dilute his worries over a marriage crisis. The men’s cosy evening takes an unexpected turn when an uninvited guest pops in and refuses to leave. Juhani, who introduces himself as a social worker, seems to have a much larger burden to carry than the two friends’ heart troubles put together.

Kaurismäki, who brought a new breathing and life to the Finnish film scene together with his brother Aki in the 1980s, does not see the corona situation as an obstacle to filmmaking, but takes it as a cool challenge – he has always preferred a small team and a small production. 

Part of our [Official Selection - Competition](https://poff.ee/en/official-selection/)


![F_1_the_yellow_cat.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_1_the_yellow_cat_62ea674fa3.jpg)
### [The Yellow Cat](https://poff.ee/en/film/the-yellow-cat/)
**20:30 Coca-Cola Plaza 6**
**23:45 Virtual Hall**

A Venice film festival selected film; a warm-hearted comedy about Kermek, who has just completed his prison term and returns to his native parts. But a lot has changed since he was last here. A gang rules the area, and they have some influence over Kermek’s girlfriend Eva. 

Kermek has thought things through and doesn’t intend to have anything to do with the local criminals. He has a plan. With Eva at his side, he wants to open a real cinema in the Kazakh mountains. Will Kermek’s love of Alain Delon be strong enough to keep him out of the violent clutches of the mafia?


![F_4_bad_tales.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_4_bad_tales_a0d736fc5b.jpg)
### [Bad Tales](https://poff.ee/en/film/bad-tales/)
**21:15 Apollo Solaris 3**

The sweltering summer heat beats down on a sterile residential estate in the suburbs of Rome. Many a family lives here that no longer belongs anywhere. There is a mysterious sense of unease that can explode at any moment.

The Italian D’Innocenzo brothers have created a wild and astonishingly mature film that combines the bitterness of Kurt Vonnegut’s vision of America with the kind of folksy, humane sense of irony familiar to us from the work of Sergio Citti. A story about women and men who see their hopes and dreams falling by the wayside all too soon.


### **PÖFF Shorts**

Today, the program of PÖFF Shorts starts with a few exciting competition programmes, like [Shorts New Talent Competition: Live Action](https://poff.ee/en/film/shorts-new-talents-competition-live-action-1/) or the [National Competition of Estonian Films](https://poff.ee/en/film/shorts-national-competition-1/). Also today: the yearly [Rejected Shorts - a compilation of the best of 'failures'](https://poff.ee/en/film/the-rejected-shorts-picture-show/). Always good for a laugh and a cringe! Check out the whole programme of [PÖFF Shorts](https://shorts.poff.ee/en) for more surprising programmes and themed casettes.
contents_ru:
[«Сентенция»](https://poff.ee/ru/film/sententia/)
19:00 Coca-Cola Plaza

Сегодня, несомненно, обязательной для посещения является дебютная работа Дмитрия Рудакова «Сентенция». Прошедший ГУЛАГ писатель Варлам Шаламов, автор «Колымских рассказов», тихо угасает в доме престарелых, но до последнего продолжает творить. Двое его самых пылких последователей пытаются собрать его творчество воедино и расшифровать каждое слово. Показ в Таллинне станет для создателей фильма вдвойне волнительным – это не только дебютная работа, представленная в конкурсной программе, но и мировая премьера. Сегодня в 19:00 в Coca-Cola Plaza. После сеанса последует серия вопросов и ответов. Картина будет также доступна для просмотра в онлайн-кинотеатре PÖFF.

<iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/jUGAyaQ3Ky4" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

[«Соперник»](https://poff.ee/film/rivaal/)
18:15 Coca-Cola Plaza

Также можем рекомендовать к просмотру фильм из страны, выбранной в этом году в качестве приоритетной, – из Германии. Драма Маркуса Ленца «Соперник» повествует о семье из двух человек – 9-летнем Романе и его маме-украинке, которые уезжают из небезопасной обстановки на родине в Германию. Там маму ожидает нелегальная работа сиделкой, а Романа сложное выстраивание отношений с Гертом, у которого они живут. Фильм на смеси немецкого, русского и украинского языков. Для русскоговорящего зрителя не составит труда понять происходящее на экране. 

<iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/1tsB5ZcoOaM" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

[«Конференция»](https://poff.ee/ru/film/conference/)
21:45 Coca-Cola Plaza

Работа Ивана Твердовского «Конференция» была представлена на Каннском и Венецианском фестивалях, а также была удостоена приза за лучший сценарий на «Кинотавре». И сегодня в 21:45 состоится повторный и последний в Таллинне сеанс картины о событиях 18-летней давности, произошедших в Театральном центре на Дубровке. Трагедия Норд-Оста и преодоление посттравматического синдрома его участниками. Фильм можно будет посмотреть и на фестивале KinoFF в Йыхви 28 ноября.

<iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/HgBWDm2sMDk" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

[«Жёлтая кошка»](https://poff.ee/film/kollane-kass/) «Жёлтая кошка»
20:30 Coca-Cola Plaza

И четвертая на сегодня русскоязычная картина приехала на PÖFF из Казахстана. В программе «Свежие веяния» будет представлен фильм «Желтая кошка» от одного из ведущих казахских режиссеров Адильхана Ержанова. За плечами у картины номинация на Венецианском фестивале этого года, а впереди сегодня – показ на PÖFF, в 20:30, в Coca-Cola Plaza. 

Кермек возвращается в родной город после тюремного заключения и видит, что городом правит криминальная группировка. Его любимая девушка Ева под давлением этих людей оказывается совершенно потерянной и сбившейся с пути, а сам Кермек погрязает в криминале. Однако у него есть мечта – вместе со своей возлюбленной вырваться на свободу и построить кинотеатр. Красочный, снятый в степи фильм, с хорошим чувством юмора. 

<iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/-7Nu8x1GPP4" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

title_et: PÖFFi esmaspäev ei löö risti ette poliitika, religiooni ja südameasjade pahupoole avamisel
lead_et: Alanud nädal pakub žanrilise mänglevusega mõtlemisainet lojaalsuse üle. Esiotsa väärikana näiv mõiste võib märkamatult hakata teenima valesid eesmärke, mil pole aja möödudes grammigi pistmist esialgsete väärtustega. Siit leiad filmid, mis loovad nii inspireerivaid kui ka vastanduvalt õpetlike näiteid tõekspidamistest, mille alustaladele inimesed oma moraalsust ehitavad.
contents_et:
**Kogu esmaspäevast PÖFFi programmi saad avastada [siit](https://poff.ee/otsi_seanssi/?dates=11/16/2020).**


![F_5_havel_b8378d1d6f.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_5_havel_b8378d1d6f_e2b6d97049.jpg)

## [Havel](https://poff.ee/film/havel/)
- [16. nov, esmaspäev 21:00. Kino Artis, Tallinn](https://store.piletilevi.ee/public/?concert=324365&shop_provider=pff&design=poff1&lang=est&center=7#view=ticketsselect)

Václav Haveli elulugu loob hiilgava materjali biograafiafilmiks, mis suudab portree esitamise taustal anda kõnekalt edasi ka 1970. aastate vastuvoolu triivivat vaimsust ja joonistab endise Tšehhoslovakkia ajaloopildi kuni Sametrevolutsioonini välja. Filmi teeb märkimisväärseks lähenemisnurk, mis väldib teadlikult kesise kangelasloo jutustamist. Mitte, et Havel filmi autorite silmis seda kuidagi rohkem või vähem oli. 

Eesmärgiks on aga siinkohal anda edasi lihast ja luust inimest, kelle kindlameelne teekond silmapaistvast näitekirjanikust kulges riigijuhi ja mõjuvõimsa poliitikuni välja, kuid oli sellegipoolest täis kiusatusi, eksimusi ja argimuresid. Seejuures loob „Havel“ kõneka näite, kui oluline on, et riigi poliitiline ladvik moodustuks teiste seas ka humanitaartaustaga kultuuritegelastest.


![F_3_Black_Light_56d05ea4b5.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_3_Black_Light_56d05ea4b5_af4590f3dd.jpg)
## [Must valgus](https://poff.ee/film/must-valgus/)
- [16. nov, esmaspäev 18:45. Coca-Cola Plaza, Tallinn](https://poff.ee/film/must-valgus/)

PÖFF pakub igal aastal erilist võimalust nautida kinosaalides Aasia filmikunsti uute ja silmapaistvate tegijate poolt. Lõuna-Korea režissööri Bae Jong-Daelti „Must valgus“ on kahtlemata üks neist filmidest, mida võiks kindlasti vaatama minna. Suurepärase nüansseeritusega kannab film eneses universaalseid käitumismustreid tõe otsingu ja teadmatuse piiril. 

„Must valgus“ lahkab sissepoole elatud tundeilma läbi ema ja teismelise tütre omavahelise suhte, kes on kaotanud traagilise autoavarii tõttu pereisa. Filmi muudab eriliseks fookuspunkt, mis võtab julgelt ette teema, millest avalikult ja avatult üldjuhul ei räägita — hukkunu lähedased kui ohvrid, kes peavad hakkama saama lisaks leinale ka paljude teiste juhtunu tõttu tekkinud probleemidega. Halvimal juhul ka süükoormaga. 

![F_4_servants_dcd7e178f3.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_4_servants_dcd7e178f3_c9d03f6494.jpg)

## [Teenrid](https://poff.ee/film/teenrid/)
- [16. nov, esmaspäev 17:45. Coca-Cola Plaza, Tallinn](https://store.piletilevi.ee/public/?concert=324330&shop_provider=pff&design=poff1&lang=est&center=7#view=ticketsselect)

„Teenrid“ avab pineva psühholoogilise põnevikuna ajaloopildi 1980. aasta Bratislavast, kus kommunistlik režiim kehtestab totalitaarse haardega oma ülemvõimu katoliku kiriku ees. Selle keerise keskel peavad usuteaduste seminari õpilased Michal ja Juraj valima Jumala teenimisel kahe tee vahel – kas kanda edasi Jumala sõna, mis sobitub kommunismi ridade vahele, või vaadata vaikides pealt usu põranda alla naelutamist.

Ivan Ostrochovský analüüsib hiilgava nüansseeritusega valikute võimatust kahe halva vahel, kus ei leidu õigeid otsuseid. Seeläbi ilmnevad inimlikul tasandil paljud ajaloo pooltoonid, mis aitavad detailsemalt näha argumente valikute kaalukausil ja vahest paremini mõista ka meie endi lähiminevikku. Tugevat teemakäsitlust toetab omakorda filmi visuaalne keel, mis haarab oma jõulise askeetlikkusega.

![F_1_honeymood_3c79fc9b78.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_1_honeymood_3c79fc9b78_024bacb9bf.jpg)

## [Luhtunud pulmaöö](https://poff.ee/film/luhtunud-pulmaoeoe/)
- [16. nov, esmaspäev 21:30. Apollo Kino Solaris, Tallinn](https://store.piletilevi.ee/public/?concert=324441&shop_provider=pff&design=poff1&lang=est&center=7#view=ticketsselect)

„Luhtunud pulmaöö“ on leid neile, kes soovivad nädala alguse puhul lubada endale mõnusat komöödiat, mis jääb oma karismaatiliste karakteritega siiski elutruuks. See on suurepärase dramaturgilise tempoga loodud teekonnafilm altari eest tagasi endiste armastuste ja tegelike palgeteni. 

„Kui palju sa kedagi armastad?“ ning „Kui palju sa teda tead?“ on kaks iselaadi küsimust. Nii on ka Eleanor rabatud, kui leiab pulmaööl oma abikaasa taskust sõrmuse, mis on mehe eksi poolt kingitud. Ootamatu leid sütitab arvukalt kahtlusi, mis panevad noorpaari suhte tõsiselt proovile. 

![F_2_the_end_93750c0d23.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_2_the_end_93750c0d23_428591932a.jpg)

## [Lõpp](https://poff.ee/film/lopp/)
- [16. nov, esmaspäev 21:15. Coca-Cola Plaza, Tallinn](https://store.piletilevi.ee/public/?center=7&lang=est&concert=324196&design=poff1#view=ticketsselect)

Vladimir Kotti komöödias puudub erinevalt „Luhtunud pulmaööst“ igasugune tordiglasuur ning tunda annab hoopiski argipäeva läägus rutiinis, mis teenib sisutut meediatööstust. See on film, mille huumori loob kibe eneseiroonia. 

Dimitri on režissöör, kelle looming kesiste seriaalide ning reklaamidega peegeldab pigem vajadust teenida korralikku elatist kui mehe annet. Mehe eneseotsingute ja eneseteostamatuse saatel analüüsib „Lõpp“ teravalt ühiskonda, mis on täis sisuloojate sisutuid üllitisi. Lihtsakoelise kriitika asemel peegeldab Kott ajendeid, mis inimest oma teel eesmärkideni kõrvale juhivad ning eksinuna tundma panevad.

title_en: Death, disco and werewolves: Black Nights day #2 offers an eclectic film choice!
lead_ru: Сегодня в программе: два кандидата на "Оскар", фильм про Виктора Цоя и первые три части немецкой классики кино "Берлин, Александерплац".
contents_en:
From talking trees, to a bus full of mourners to unexpected nights with the noisy neighbours from upstairs, day 2 at Black Nights is all about eclectic ensembles. A famous one among them is the Liverpoolian band The Real Thing, once dubbed 'the black Beatles' by the press, who rose from working-class boys from one of Liverpool’s toughest neighbourhoods to Britain’s most-celebrated originators of soul, funk and disco. 

Check out some of the quirky films we recommend from today's programme below, and find the full programme [HERE](https://poff.ee/en/search_screening/?dates=11/14/2020)

![F_1_berlin_alexanderplatz_remastered.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_1_berlin_alexanderplatz_remastered_dd4939fc23.jpg)
### [Berlin Alexanderplatz](https://poff.ee/en/film/berlin-alexanderplatz-ep-1-3/)
**14:30 (parts 1-3) & 18:30 (parts 4-7) | Artis 2** 
**17:30 | Virtual Hall** 

“About twenty years ago – I was just fourteen, maybe fifteen, and afflicted by an almost murderous puberty – I came across Alfred Döblin’s ‘Berlin Alexanderplatz’ during the course of my very un-academic, extremely personal literary journey, governed entirely by my own instinctive associations.“

This is how Rainer Werner Fassbinder remembers his first encounter with the novel from which he created his own 15½-hour television adaptation. Today we screen this cult piece as a special screening related to this year's [German Focus](https://poff.ee/en/in-focus-new-german-cinema/). 

![F_1_the_hidden_life_of_trees.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_1_the_hidden_life_of_trees_c95bf7b633.jpg)
### [The Hidden Life of Trees](https://poff.ee/en/film/the-hidden-life-of-trees/)
**16:00 | Apollo Solaris 3**

Are trees able to talk? Do they have a memory and a social life? The forester and bestselling author Peter Wohlleben gets to the bottom of these questions and opens our eyes to the hidden world of the woods.

Part of our new [Environmental Films Programme](https://poff.ee/en/environment-agency-environmental-film-programme/) and [#PÖFFTRENDING](https://poff.ee/en/trending/).


![F_1_everything_the_real_thing_story_1061ca9fe2.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_1_everything_the_real_thing_story_1061ca9fe2_d29c35c664.jpg)
### [Everything: The Real Thing Story](https://poff.ee/en/film/everything-the-real-thing-story/)
**18:00 | Apollo Solaris 6**

Part of the new [#PÖFFTRENDING](https://poff.ee/en/trending/) programme is the story of the first black band to score a #1 hit. The press dubbed them ‘The Black Beatles’ – Eddy, Chris, Dave and Ray – four working-class boys from one of Liverpool’s toughest neighbourhoods. Their photos appeared on the bedroom walls of white, teenage girls - which meant a shift in racial tensions of the era. 


![F_6_tsoi.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_6_tsoi_705e0ffdcd.jpg)
### [Tsoi](https://poff.ee/en/film/tsoi/)
**18:00 | Kohtla-Järve Kultuurikeskus** 
**21:00 | Apollo Solaris 3**

15 August 1990. Viktor Tsoi, the Soviet Union’s most famous rock star, leader of the band Kino, a symbol of freedom and change, dies in an accident on a Latvian highway. The bus driver who was involved in the tragic accident. Tsoi’s wife and her new boyfriend, his mistress, his producer, his young son and an obsessed photographer – are all part of the trip back with Tsoi's body to Leningrad. And it's going to be a trip! 

![F_1_sweat_db24989811.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_1_sweat_db24989811_fe31910a48.jpg)
### [Sweat](https://poff.ee/en/film/sweat/)
**18:30 | Apollo Solaris 3**
**21:45 | Virtual Hall**

The story of Polish fitness star Sylwia is simultaneously a portrait of our times. With 600,000 followers she can rightly be called an influencer. But how much of herself does she really show and what emotions lie beneath her self-assured image? It all comes to a breaking point when Sylwia is confronted with a stalker.  


![F_1_the_people_upstairs_6c365bc819.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_1_the_people_upstairs_6c365bc819_cbeabb79ea.jpg)
### [The People Upstairs](https://poff.ee/en/film/the-people-upstairs/)
**20:30 | Coca-Cola Plaza 2**

A bickering, loveless couple and their next-door neighbours - a younger couple - get together. The evening will end in a cathartic way. 


![F_3_teddy.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_3_teddy_8db69731d2.jpg)
### [Teddy](https://poff.ee/en/film/teddy/)
**20:30 | Apollo Solaris 3**
**23:30 | Virtual Hall**

You know how it goes... You think you are going to spend a careless summer holiday with your girlfriend, but instead, on full moon night, you are scratched by an unknown beast. What will become of social outcast Teddy, who starts to feel more and more animalistic as the days pass?
contents_ru:
Во второй день кинофестиваля зрителей порадуют сильные авторские фильмы. В эти выходные можно найти и много подходящих картин для просмотра всей семьей – для этого загляните в программу нашего субфестиваля молодежного и дестского кино Just Film.

Для русскоговорящих зрителей бесспорно этот фестивальный день особенно удачный.

В 16:15 в кинотеатре Coca-Cola Plaza начнется сеанс фильма-сенсации этого года ["Дорогие товарищи!"](https://poff.ee/ru/film/dear-comrades/). Лауреат премии PÖFF "За дело всей жизни" Андрей Кончаловский представил свою новую картину в сентябре этого года на Венецианском фестивале. В Венеции картина была удостоена специального приза жюри, а затем она выиграла и главный приз Чикагского кинофестиваля. Позавчера фильм вышел в прокат в России, и вчера его выдвинули от страны на "Оскар". Главную роль исполнила Юлия Высоцкая. Черно-белый фильм посвящен событиям, произошедшим в Новочеркасске (Ростовкая обл.) в 1962 году, когда армия расстреляла толпу бастующих работников завода. 

![F_1_dear_comrades.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_1_dear_comrades_4df41c664b.jpg)

В 22:00 в Apollo Kino Solaris начнется показ нового [фильма Алексея Учителя "Цой"](https://poff.ee/ru/film/czoj/). Фильм о легендарном Викторе Цое без его присутствия в фильме. Главный герой — обычный советский водитель Павел Шелест, автобус которого однажды августовским днем столкнулся неподалеку от Риги с легковым «Москвичом». Кто сидел за рулем этой машины, Павел и не подозревал...  

![F_1_tsoi.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_1_tsoi_e28a42c04b.jpg)

Вторым фильмом в сегодняшней программе, выдвинутым на "Оскар" (2015), стали ["Мандарины"](https://poff.ee/film/mandariinid/). Фильм вошел в программу памяти грузинского режиссера Зазы Урушадзе. Сеанс состоится в 21:00 в Apollo Kino Solaris.

![F_4_tangerines.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_4_tangerines_285b9865b4.jpg)

В этом году в фокусе фестиваля – новое немецкое кино. В программе представлены лучшие современные фильмы из Германии. Однако будет и спецпоказ фильма, ставшего классикой немецкого кинематографа, ["Берлин, Александерплац"](https://poff.ee/film/berliin-alexanderplatz-osad-1-3/). Фильм состоит из 13 частей. И сегодня покажут первые три.
![F_1_berlin_alexanderplatz_remastered.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_1_berlin_alexanderplatz_remastered_dd4939fc23.jpg)

[ВСЯ ПРОГРАММА](https://poff.ee/otsi_seanssi/?dates=11/14/2020) на 14 ноября.

title_et: PÖFF Shorts toob populaarse viiruse kinoekraanile
lead_et: Pandeemia, tüütud naabrid ja armastus 2+2 ajastul – need on vaid mõned teemad lühifilmide ja animatsiooni festivali PÖFF Shorts lühifilmikogumikus "Made in Corona: lood seestpoolt", mis koosneb tervenisti koroonaviiruse ajal tehtud lühifilmidest.
contents_et:
"Nendes üheksast eri riigist pärit filmides tõusevad esile põhiküsimused, millega kõik oleme pidanud 2020. aastal silmitsi seisma, käsitledes valitsevat olukorda nii meeleheite kui huumoriga," sõnas PÖFF Shortsi juht Grete Nellis.

Kogumikus teeb maailma esilinastuse Hõbe Ilusa **"Südameaeg"** (USA, Eesti, 2020), telefonikõnede katketest kokku pandud intiimne dokumentaalfilm, mille peategelasteks on kolm New Yorkis elavat tütart ja nende Eestis, Portugalis ja Delhis elavad vanemad.

Mängufilmis **"Alkoholivaba õlu"** (Sri Lanka, 2020) näeme, kuidas arenevad ühe sõpruskonna suhted veebikõne vaheldusel, kui hiljuti vallaliseks jäänud mees teeb ootamatu ülestunnistuse. Režissöör Asoka Handagama on Pimedate Ööde filmifestivali programmis olnud varasemalt täispikkade filmidega "Las ta nutab" (2015) ja "Asandhimitta" (2018).

Festivali programmi naaseb ka režissöör Theodor Ushev animafilmiga isolatsioonist ehk **"Elu kastis"** (Kanada, 2020). Theodor Ushevi "Raskemeelsuse füüsika" (Kanada, 2019) võistles PÖFF Shortsi rahvusvahelises animafilmide programmis 2019. aastal.

Koroonafilmide valikus linastuvad veel režissööride Claudiu Mitcu, Ioachim Stroe, Andrei Butică dokfilm **"Esimene mai"** (2020) Rumeeniast, Yorgos Zoisi ulmefilm **"Puuduta mind"** (2020) ja Anastasia Sima mängufilm **"Antiviirus"** (2020) Kreekast, Philippe Prouffi omanimeline **"Philippe Prouffi tähestik"** (2020) Prantsusmaalt, Peter Shaheeni mängufilm **"Varajane 'tiin: üks karantiiniaegne film"** (2020) Ameerika Ühendriikidest ja Ben Marshali mängufilm **"Stockholmi sündroom"** (2020) Ühendkuningriikidest.

**"Made in Corona: lood seestpoolt"** linastub pühapäeval, 22. novembril kell 18:45 Coca-Cola Plazas. PÖFFi virtuaalses kinosaalis saab kogumikku vaadata alates esmaspäevast, 23. novembrist aadressil kino.poff.ee.

Rahvusvaheline lühifilmide ja animatsiooni festival PÖFF Shorts leiab aset 17.–25. novembrini.

title_et: Keskkonnaagentuur
contents_et:
PÖFFi keskkonnafilmide eriprogrammi toob vaatajateni Keskkonnaagentuur. Iga film eriprogrammist kujutab keskkonnateemalisi probleeme erinäolise nurga alt viisil, mis sunnib vaatajat kaasa mõtlema ning oma järeldusi tegema. 

Keskkonnaagentuuri põhiülesandeks on teha looduses keskkonnseiret – muuhulgas ka PÖFFi vapilooma hundi osas. Pildil näete tema kaelas telemeetrilist jälgimisseadet, mille abil kogume andmeid huntide liikumise, karjaelu, söögilaua ning harjumuste kohta.
contents_en:
PÖFF’s special programme of environmental films is brought to the viewers by the Environment Agency. Every film in the special programme depicts environmental problems from a different angle in a way that forces the viewers to think along a draw their own conclusions.

The main task of the Environment Agency is to perform environmental monitoring in the nature – among other things also for wolves who are the emblem of PÖFF. On the photo, you can see a wolf wearing a telemetric tracking device with which we gather data about the movement, pack life, dinner table and habits of wolves.

thumbnail.contents_en:
This years’ 24th PÖFF will differ from previous years due to the coronavirus – for the first time movies can be viewed at the cinema as well as online. We are working in cooperation with medical companies SYNLAB and Medicum and the family physician centre Sinu Arst as well as consulting with the Health Board to ensure a safe environment for cinema visitors and to prevent the spread of the coronavirus at festival-related events.

We really care about our visitors and so we want the festival experience to be as pleasant, comfortable and as safe as possible for everyone.

**PÖFF lasts for two and a half weeks, so to ensure a successful experience for all, we have compiled the following guidelines and rules:**
- We strongly recommend that you buy your tickets online from the PÖFF or Piletilevi website. Buying a ticket from home is easy, convenient and safe.
- All festival related information can be found on the PÖFF website. If you have any questions, don’t hesitate to write to us at kassa@poff.ee. We’ll gladly assist you. 
- During the festival, please visit the PÖFF information desk only if absolutely necessary. It is in the interests of all of us that there are no queues at the ticket office. We follow the 2 + 2 rule. 
- Wearing masks is obligatory at festival events and areas. Feel free to come with your own mask. If you do not have a mask, you can get one for free from our volunteer when entering the festival area. 
- If you still happen to buy a ticket at the PÖFF ticket office, be prepared for the ticket to be personalized. To do this, you will be asked for your information. You are not allowed to change seats in the cinema hall.
- Body temperature may be randomly checked before entering the cinema hall. If you are feeling ill, we kindly ask you to stay at home and enjoy our movies online. 
- Anyone who is ill or has been in contact with a COVID-19 positive person in the last 14 days, or who has a restriction of freedom of movement for up to 14 days, is not allowed to attend the screening.
- We ask everyone to use the disinfectants that the festival cinemas have been equipped with.
- Cinema halls will be cleaned and disinfected after every screening (every 2-4 hours).
- Before and after each screening, the screening introductor / volunteer will draw the attention of the whole audience to the safety measures to prevent the spread of the coronavirus - by recommending wearing a mask, following the 2 + 2 rule and other safety precautions. 
- To avoid congestion at the exits, at the end of the session guests will be asked to leave the hall in rows.

**What happens to your ticket if a session or festival is cancelled due to the COVID-19 virus?**
- We hope you’ll agree to exchange the missed screening ticket for the next screening ticket for the same movie. If the desired movie is no longer in the cinema, we offer the opportunity to exchange the ticket for another movie or watch the same movie online, where you can see most of the festival's movies.
- Those who wish can also donate the money paid for the missed screening ticket to support PÖFF. Ticket revenue is one of our most important sources of income - especially this year, when the coronavirus has made life very difficult for the film industry and cultural event organizers. In case of a donation, please inform the festival organizers at kassa@poff.ee.
- If none of the solutions above are suitable, we will reimburse your ticket.

Let’s give it our best to make the 24th PÖFF as great and safe as it has been in previous years!
thumbnail.contents_ru:
В связи с пандемией коронавируса 24-й кинофестиваль PÖFF будет заметно отличаться от предыдущих. Впервые первый показ фильма можно будет посмотреть не только в кинотеатре, но и в веб-сети. Организаторы кинофестиваля тесно сотрудничают  с медицинскими центрами SYNLAB и Medicum, с центром семейных врачей Sinu Arst (твой врач), а также консультируются с департаментом здоровья, чтобы гарантировать  кинозрителям безопасную среду и избежать заражения коронавирусом на мероприятиях кинофестиваля.

Организаторы кинофестиваля заботяться о своих гостях и желают, чтобы всем было приятно, удобно и надежно. 

**Кинофестиваль PÖFF продлится две с половиной недели, и чтобы он был успешно завершен, его организаторы составили нижеследующие руководства и правила:**
- Настоятельная просьба покупать билеты на сайтах PÖFF или Piletilevi, это просто, удобно и безопасно.
- Вся информация, касающаяся кинофестиваля, выложена на сайте PÖFF. При возникновении  вопросов, обращайтесь по адресу электронной почты kassa@poff.ee. Вам всегда будут рады помочь.
- Инфопункт PÖFF советуем посещать только в случае крайней необходимости. В наших общих интересах не создавать очередей. Следуем правилу 2+2.
- Настоятельная просьба носить маски на мероприятиях и на территории кинофестиваля. На киносеанс можно придти в своей маске. Маску можно также получить бесплатно, обратившись к волонтеру.
- Если вы все же купите билет в кассе PÖFF, будьте готовы, что ваш билет персонализируют, спросив ваши данные, в кинозале вы займете указанное на билете место. 
- Перед входом в кинозал у гостей выборочно измеряют температуру. В случае недомогания лучше остаться дома и посмотеть фильм в веб-сети.
- На сеанс не допускают больных, близконтактных, обязанных самоизолироваться на 14 дней.
- На входе в кинозалы имеются дезинфицирующие средства, просим пользоваться ими.
- В перерыве между киносеансами производится уборка и дезинфицирование кинозалов (каждые 2–4 часа).
- До и после киносеанса персонал кинотеатра или волонтеры напомнят кинозрителям о необходимости соблюдать меры предосторожности, чтобы не заразиться коронавирусом и следовать правилу 2+2.
- После окончания сеанса кинозрители должны выходить из кинозала порядно, чтобы избежать толкучки на выходе.

**Что будет с билетом в случае отмены киносеанса или если кинофестиваль не состоится ввиду пандемии коронавируса?**
- Надеемся, что кинозритель согласен поменять билет на следующий сеанс. Если же фильм не будет больше демонстрироваться, то кинозрителю будет предложена возможность обменять билет на другой фильм или же посмотреть фильм в веб-сети, где выложена большая часть фестивальных фильмов.
- Желающие могут пожертвовать потраченные на билет деньги на несостоявшийся сеанс в поддержку кинофестиваля Темные ночи (PÖFF). Вырученные за билеты деньги – один из важнейших источников дохода, особенно в этом году, когда коронавирус сильно усложнил жизнь работникам кинопроизводства и организаторам культурных мероприятий. О пожертовании следует сообщить на адрес электронной почты кинофестиваля info@poff.ee.
- В случае если не один из предложенных вариантов не подходит, то деньги за билет возвращаются.
Давайте же общими усилиями постараемся, чтобы 24-й кинофестиваль PÖFF был таким же классным и безопасным, как во все предыдущие годы!

thumbnail.title_en: Focus country Germany brings a scandalous biopic to open the festival
thumbnail.lead_en: Germany will be the Focus Country for this year’s hybrid 24th edition of the festival. The festival’s Opening Film will be Oskar Roehler’s Fassbinder biopic Enfant Terrible. Fourteen more German films will screen online and onsite as part of the In Focus: New German Cinema selection.
thumbnail.contents_en:
Distributed among several sections of the festival, from First Features, through Rebels With a Cause, to the Official Selection – Competition, an abundance of quality German cinema will be represented in Tallinn this November. The German Oskar Roehler’s **Enfant Terrible** will be the festival's **opening film**. 

The festival welcomes two German films for their world premieres, alongside festival circuit favourites including Julia von Heinz’s **And Tomorrow The Entire World**, which recently premiered in **Venice’s official competition**, two of **2020’s Berlinale Golden Bear competitors** and the **Cannes-debuting Enfant Terrible**. Finally, there will be Special Screenings of **two pivotal pieces from German filmmaking history**, Rainer Werner Fassbinder’s remastered **Berlin Alexanderplatz** and Margarethe von Trotta’s **Marianne & Juliane**. 
 
The programme is presented in collaboration with German Films and long-term festival supporter, the [Goethe-Institut](https://www.goethe.de/ins/ee/de/index.html). In addition to the programme of the main festival, sub-festival [PÖFF Shorts](https://shorts.poff.ee/en/) will screen Next Generation Short Tiger projects from Germany. Ulrich Ribbert, Director of the Goethe-Institut Estland, is looking forward to the festival: „The 24th edition of [PÖFF](www.poff.ee/en) will be something very special for those who are hungry for films and for fans of German cinema. The programme is certainly a highlight of this year's cultural events.“  
 
In addition to screenings, German screenwriters and professionals will participate in a variety of [I@T&BE](https://industry.poff.ee/) programmes, including presenting renowned scriptwriters at the TV Beats forum, showcasing actor Aaron Hilmer as part of [Black Nights Stars](https://poff.ee/en/news/pof-fi-article-18/) and joining a roundtable on production design “Lost in translation? Visual story development from script to screen” under the [Black Room](https://poff.ee/en/news/pof-fi-article-19/) banner, in collaboration with Variety magazine. 

The full line-up of Black Nights will be announced on the 6th of November. 
Ticket sale for the first screenings of the films in the programme will begin this Friday.


### **FILMS**
 
![EnfantTerrible_KatjaRiemann_OliverMasucci©BavariaFilmproduktion-2.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/Enfant_Terrible_Katja_Riemann_Oliver_Masucci_Bavaria_Filmproduktion_2_d2002c5002.jpg)
**Opening Film - Enfant Terrible**
Oskar Roehler’s Enfant Terrible begins as it means to go on, in controversial and unconventional style, with a rough and ready, stylized aesthetic and powerful central performances. Unravelling in episodic fragments, we watch the pieces of one of Germany’s most celebrated and prolific filmmakers coalesce into the legend we now know. It’s a story of obsession, creative struggle and the consequences for those caught up in the whirlwind of Fassbinder’s blaze of filmmaking glory. The film has received the Cannes and premiered at Hamburg IFF, having its Estonian premiere at Black Nights. 

***Festival Director Tiina Lokk commented:***
“Rainer Werner Fassbinder, together with Margarethe von Trotta, Volker Schlöndorff and Werner Herzog and others are the creative force that came to be called New German Cinema. 
They were the **key figures** who helped to put **post-war German cinema**, suffering a two-decade-long identity crisis, on the world map again.” 
Of the festival’s **Opening Film**, she noted that, “Enfant Terrible is definitely **not your average classical biopic**. Thanks to great use of locations, fantastic art direction and the decision to keep the storytelling creatively loose, regarding what actually happened in Fassbinder’s life. 
Feeling **scandalously candid** and painful in places, we can say the film really ascends to the act of telling a story of an artist, offering a perspective, through superb acting, on the enormous inner turmoil of an artist, on having a conflict with yourself, society and its written and unwritten rules. 
Definitely **one of the most interesting and controversial films of the year** that should resonate strongly with audiences in the #metoo era.” 
 
### **In Focus: New German Cinema**

![F_1_BERLIN_ALEXANDERPLATZ.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_1_BERLIN_ALEXANDERPLATZ_9b5d9432a3.jpg)
**Berlin Alexanderplatz**
From Afgan-German director Burhan Qurbani, this sleek, neon-tinged interpretation of Alfred Döblin’s novel brings past and present colliding together. Exploring the endless cycle of risk, reward, restraint and reinvention, a recent immigrant struggles to find his path in modern Germany. After having its world premiere at the Berlinale, it comes to PÖFF as an international premiere. 
 
![F_1_undine.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_1_undine_4d4ca274b5.jpg)
**Undine** 
This German-French co-production from director, and central-figure of the Berlin School, Christian Petzold, won its lead actress, Paula Beer, a Silver Bear at Berlin. Bringing a mythological twist to a suspenseful love story, with occasional, hypnotic diversions into urban planning theory, it’s a film to let wash over you and savour. The film screens as an Estonian premiere and as part of the Screen International Critics' Choice line up. 
 
![F_2_exile.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_2_exile_a487908bd0.jpg)
**Exile** 
Visar Morina’s second feature comes to PÖFF after a world premiere at Sundance. Is the anti-heroic central character, an immigrant engineer, held back and oppressed by his environment or building a paranoid prison of his own making? The visual world of this German-Kosovan co-production reflects his claustrophobic interior life in intricate, repeating interior spaces. 
 
![F_1_walchensee_forever.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_1_walchensee_forever_d939f50904.jpg)
**Walchensee Forever** 
Director Janna Ji Wonders takes her audience on an autobiographical journey to the lakeside center of her family’s universe. Four generations of women ponder concepts of home, family, and fulfillment in this Berlinale-premiering documentary which has its Estonian premiere at PÖFF this year. The film won the Bavarian Film Award in January. 
 
![F_1_home.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_1_home_74239d76e1.jpg)
**Home** 
Actress Franka Potente makes her directorial and featuring writing debut with Home. A freed felon finds little has changed in the microcosm of small-town America, where his past casts a long shadow. Even under the weight of past grudges, there is still an opening for redemption in a budding relationship that crosses the divide. Home screens as an Estonian premiere. 
 
![F_4_and_tomorrow_the_entire_world.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_4_and_tomorrow_the_entire_world_e2b9f5a03e.jpg)
**And Tomorrow The Entire World** 
A young woman in the cauldron of political protest faces down fundamental questions, personal and political, in Julia von Heinz’s ultra-current, Antifa-focussed piece. How far over the line would you step to defend your beliefs? Von Heinz was the first female German director to join Venice’s official competition since Margharete von Trotta. 

![F_5_model_olimpia.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_5_model_olimpia_cc87c99881.jpg) 
**Model Olimpia** 
Director Frédéric Hambalek paints DIY therapy, existential dread, and psychological terror across a canvas of German domesticity. Up to its final frames, it skillfully skirts the boundaries of fantasy and reality. This deeply unsettling debut has its world premiere at PÖFF as part of the First Features Competition programme.  
 
![F_2_cocoon.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_2_cocoon_b8b8841ae5.jpg)
**Cocoon** 
Leonie Krippendorff’s hot and bright coming-of-age drama finds a gaggle of teenage girls discovering themselves in the sweltering heat of a Berlin summer. One shy 14-year old steps out of her comfort zone, beyond her smartphone screen and into adult life. The film appears as an Estonian premiere after debuting in Berlin’s Generation 14plus strand. 
 
![F_3_caged_birds.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_3_caged_birds_0bd2de5fbf.jpg)
**Caged Birds** 
In the conjoined-fate of a wild-eyed, jailed counter-culture icon and the idealistic lawyer trying to free him, we zero in on the universal desire to simply be free. The drama is driven by perfectly off-kilter performances and swirling political machinations. Oliver Rihs’ Swiss/German co-production takes part in PÖFF’s main competition and screens as an international premiere. 
 
![F_1_Curveball_a_true_story_unfortunately.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_1_Curveball_a_true_story_unfortunately_1a7e96c670.jpg)
**Curveball – A True Story. Unfortunately.**
Johannes Naber’s semi-fictionalized take on the German involvement in the build-up to the Iraq war charts a winding path through truths and untruths. It’s an absurd, blackly-comic, and slightly queasy vision of chancers and ideologues all pushing their luck to tell their own stories. Curveball is an Estonian premiere at PÖFF. 
 
![F_2_rival.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_2_rival_9f6b0b3cee.jpg)
**Rival** 
Shuffling languages, shifting genres, and challenging perspectives, Marcus Lenz’s feature is an Estonian premiere in Tallinn. An undocumented Ukranian nine-year-old in Germany must come to terms with his predicament, a changing sense of home, and the various adults drifting in and out of his orbit. 
 
![F_1_BLACK_MILK.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_1_BLACK_MILK_2b0e8a238b.jpg)
**Black Milk** 
In a radical and female-first, semi-autobiographical piece directed by Uisenma Borchu, two sisters reunite in the Mongolian steppes. Though carrying her Western learnings, Wessi rediscovers a deeper and more transgressive connection in the rituals and people of her home. After premiering at Berlin, Black Milk comes to Tallinn as an Estonian premiere. Uisenma Borchu’s debut Don’t Look at Me This Way had the international premiere at the First Feature Competition of Black Nights in 2015.
 
![F_1_cortex.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_1_cortex_35569ea174.jpg)
**Cortex** 
Moritz Bleibtreu is both lead actor and first-time director in this inventive and mind-bending nocturnal thriller. Reality and dreams fray at the seams, as a supermarket security guard struggles through nested elevated-genre plotlines. After screening in Zurich and Hamburg, Cortex joins PÖFF’s Rebels With a Cause strand for its Estonian Premiere. 
 
### **Children’s and youth film festival [Just Film](https://www.justfilm.ee/en/)** 
 
![F_1_Madison_A_Fast_Friendship.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_1_Madison_A_Fast_Friendship_53966fefd2.jpg)
**Madison - A Fast Friendship** 
Kim Strobl sits her youthful cast atop a variety of two-wheeled contraptions as the titular Madison learns a lot about both competitive bicycling and friendship. With a stunning backdrop of Germany’s rolling hills and mountains, this family-friendly coming-of-age feature joins the Black Nights youth sub-festival Just Film’s programme this November. 
 
Find the other programmes and news at www.poff.ee/en

thumbnail.contents_et:
PÖFF TV on Pimedate Ööde Filmifestivali erikanal online keskkonnas, mida saavad vaadata kõik filmihundid siit ja kaugemalt. Tule uuri lähemalt [siit](https://poff.elisastage.ee/)!

PÖFF TV on keskkond, mis täiendab filmiprogrammi ja koondab kokku festivalielu ja -melu. Siit leiad intervjuud filmikülaliste ja -sõpradega, filmisoovitusi, lugusid festivali korraldamisest kui ka koostöödest. Ka saad osa PÖFFi avamisest kui ka lõpetamisest, pressiüritustest - otseülekandena.
